channel.title: Please help! (auto cache downloader)
channel.description:
Okay, I recently fixed my webclient problems. But now I recently made an auto cache downloader, And I get this error in the client run when I run it:
ColdBrain Is Loading.. java.io.FileNotFoundException: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/100195671/insidiaXV8cach e.rar at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown So urce) at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsURLConnectionImpl.getInputStream(Unkn own Source) at CacheDownloader.downloadFile(CacheDownloader.java:109) at CacheDownloader.downloadCache(CacheDownloader.java:79) at client.startUp(client.java:9046) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6073) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) UNZIP java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\insidiaXV8cache\Maps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.<init>(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:111) at client.startUp(client.java:9047) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6073) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.io.FileNotFoundException: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/100195671/insidiaXV8cach e.rar at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance0(Native Method)
at sun.reflect.NativeConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Source)
at sun.reflect.DelegatingConstructorAccessorImpl.newInstance(Unknown Sou rce) at java.lang.reflect.Constructor.newInstance(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection$6.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getChainedException(Unkno wn Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown So urce) at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsURLConnectionImpl.getInputStream(Unkn own Source) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:109) at Update.<init>(Update.java:27) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4766) at client.startUp(client.java:9057) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6073) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/100195671/ins idiaXV8cache.rar at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown So urce) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getHeaderField(Unknown So urce) at java.net.URLConnection.getHeaderFieldLong(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLengthLong(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLConnection.getContentLength(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.https.HttpsURLConnectionImpl.getContentLength(Un known Source) at Update.downloadFile(Update.java:104) ... 6 more error
And it says on the client, "Error Loading Please Report"
Also, When I go to the main home page of my Dropbox, It says the file isnt found of my cache that's in the public folder. Please help!

item.title: Please help! (auto cache downloader)
item.dc:creator: @rt-gamer rt-gamer
item.description:
@rt-gamer wrote:

Only thing i would think is that you uploaded it wrong
